title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, voice).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement inside VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models in production-grade RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function-calling, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stacks with GPU support, WebUI, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama and common models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client with serde types and native-tls; published on crates.io.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI fork that adds an Ollama backend for chatting with local models.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Go, C#, Swift, PHP, Dart and more.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated datasets and evaluation scripts for benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Utility to convert and push Hugging Face models directly into Ollama model registry.
